name: Submodels

          • Model Type: {{submodelElement.modelType.name}}
          • mime Type: {{submodelElement.mimeType}}
          • Value Type: {{submodelElement.valueType.dataObjectType.name}}
          • Value: {{submodelElement.value}}

Node-Red Dashboard Custom CSS
format:
<style>
    :root {
        --logo-blue: #3456A1;
    }

    /*Main background*/
    body {
        background:
            -webkit-linear-gradient(-5deg, #0F0F0F 10%, rgb(20, 11, 40) 50%, rgb(11, 25, 40) 100%),
            -webkit-linear-gradient(55deg, #005B41 0%, #008170 10%, #232D3F 80%, #144a95 100%);
        background-repeat: no-repeat, no-repeat;
        background-size: cover, cover;
    }

    .cenas {
        /*rba(29, 35, 46, 1)
    rgba(251, 254, 249, 0.1),
    */
        background:
            -webkit-linear-gradient(55deg, #005B41 0%, #005B41 50%, #005B41 100%);
        background:
            -webkit-linear-gradient(55deg, #005B41 0%, #005B41 50%, #005B41 100%);
    }

    /*Top bar*/
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar {
        background-color: #FFFFFF !important;
        color: rgb(0, 0, 0) !important;
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-toolbar .md-toolbar-tools {
        color: rgb(18, 13, 29) !important;
    }

    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-content md-card {
        background-color: rgb(9, 6, 11, 0) !important;
        color: #FFFFFF !important;
    }


    /*Left menu*/
    /*Sidebar*/
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav {

        color: rgb(48, 49, 52) !important;
        background-color: rgba(50, 0, 0, 0) !important;
    }

    /*Hover selection*/
    a.md-no-style,
    button.md-no-style {
        border-radius: 3px !important;
    }

    /*Selected*/
    .nr-menu-item-active div button {
        border-right: 2px rgb(19, 8, 30) !important;
    }

    /*List*/
    body.nr-dashboard-theme md-sidenav div.md-list-item-inner {
        color: white !important;
        /*background-color: rgba(40,85,165,1) !important;*/
        background-color: rgb(19, 8, 30) !important;
        border-radius: 0px !important;
    }


    /*Groups*/
    ui-card-panel {
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.01) !important;
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel {
        border: none !important;
    }

    /*Name groups*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme ui-card-panel p.nr-dashboard-cardtitle {
        color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
    }


    /*Bouttons*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme .nr-dashboard-button .md-button {
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, .1) !important;
    }

    .md-button {
        border-radius: 10px !important;
    }



    /*Dropdown menu*/
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu {
        background-color: rgba(35, 35, 35, 1) !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu,
    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option {
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.7) !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme .md-select-menu-container {
        border-radius: 5px !important;
        border: none !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-theme md-select-menu md-option[selected] {
        color: rgb(121, 121, 121) !important;
        background-color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.8) !important;
    }

    .md-select-value {
        border-color: transparent !;
    }

    .md-select-value>span {
        color: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.9) !important;
        border-color: transparent !;
    }

    /*Template*/
    md-card>img,
    md-card>md-card-header img,
    md-card md-card-title-media img {
        border-radius: 5px !important;
    }

    /* Color picker text BG */
    .nr-dashboard-theme .color-picker-input-wrapper>input {
        color: white !important;
        background-color: transparent !important;
    }
</style>
